wikipedia_page.main: Squadron Leader Terence 'Terry' Malcolm Bulloch, DSO & Bar, DFC & Bar (19 February 1916 – 13 November 2014) was a Royal Air Force Coastal Command pilot during the Second World War. He carried out the highest number of attacks on U-boats during the Battle of the Atlantic, sinking a record total of three (U-597, U-611 and U-514).
